duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on analog mixed signal power chips with large digital content, implemented in state-of-the art process technology.
Perform RTL coding, simulation, synthesis, timing closure, verification, evaluation, debugging of large digital blocks at circuit and behavioral levels.
Work on chip partitioning, define interfaces between analog and digital domains, and ensure overall product functionality.
Communicate with a highly talented team of analog and digital design engineers and verification engineers to solve problems and present information.
Participate in work groups, providing ideas and collaborative teamwork.

education_certification.credential: BS (MS or PhD preferred) degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent with 10+ years experience
